 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפַן‎</span>, once, erroneous, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span>] **verb** ==cover, cover in, panel== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפַן‎</span> is ***respect, care for***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מספנת‎</span> ***roof***, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>330</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְפַן‎</span> Ithpe\`el ***be covered, overlaid***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***sapânu***</u></abbr> (sometimes ***šapânu!***), ***cover, over-whelm*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>508</sup>; ***sapannu, concealment, obscurity, depth*** (of sea); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***invalescere, percrebescere, praevalere***, [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>406</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסְפֹּן אֶתהַֿבַּיִת גֵּבִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.6.9|1Kgs 6:9]] ***and he covered in the house with beams (?)***; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפוֺן בָּאָ֑רֶז‎</span> [[Jer.22.14|Jer 22:14]] (reading with [[BDB#JDMich|JDMich]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] Or [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] [[BDB#Co|Co]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַלּוֺנָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפוֺן‎</span>, for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַלּוֺנַי וְסָפוּן‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Sm xxx</sup>) ***covering*** (it) ***in, panelling*** (it) with cedar; ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפוּן בְּאֶרֶז‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.7|1Kgs 7:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפֻן בְּאֶרֶז‎</span> v[[1Kgs.7.3|1Kgs 7:3]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּבָֽתֵּיכֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפוּנִים‎</span> [[Hag.1.14|Hag 1:14]] ***in your panelled houses.*** — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפוּן‎</span> strangely = ***reserved, laid up***, [[Deut.33.21|Deut 33:21]], and = ***hidden*** v[[Deut.33.19|Deut 33:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂפֻנֵי טְמֻנֵי חוֺל‎</span> (only here with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span>; both in sense of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָפוּן‎</span> [read this ?], compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]).
